extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running any of the affected products or versions: CIROS <= 7.0.6, FluidDraw P5, FluidDraw P6 < 6.2c, MES PC with preinstalled MES4 before December 2022.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected version of FluidDraw?
Is the FluidDraw installation package version below 6.2c?

extracted_playbook.title: Skip CodeMeter Installation from FluidDraw Package
extracted_playbook.description: Do not use the WIBU CodeMeter package included in the FluidDraw installation package. Instead, download and install the current CodeMeter version from the WIBU website.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Existing WIBU CodeMeter Installations
extracted_playbook.description: If a vulnerable CodeMeter version is already installed, update it to the current version from the WIBU website.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected version of CIROS?

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure CIROS Installer is Post-September 15, 2022
extracted_playbook.description: For future CIROS installations, use an installer downloaded after September 15, 2022, from the Festo Infoportal.

extracted_playbook.title: Update WIBU CodeMeter Runtime for CIROS
extracted_playbook.description: Update the WIBU CodeMeter Runtime to at least version 7.30a from the WIBU Systems website for existing CIROS installations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running MES PC with preinstalled MES4 before December 2022?

extracted_playbook.title: Update CodeMeter Runtime for MES PC
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the PC has at least CodeMeter Runtime 7.30a installed. Download the update from the WIBU Systems website if necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Unprivileged Access and Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict unprivileged access to machines running Festo software and minimize and protect network access to connected devices using state-of-the-art techniques and processes.

affected_products: MES PC with preinstalled MES4 before December 2022
